safeLongToInt

public static int safeLongToInt(long longValue,
                                boolean roundIfNeeded)
Safely casts long to int.

Parameters:
longValue - The long to cast
roundIfNeeded - Indicating whether to change the value of the number if it exceeds int's max/min values. If set to false and the long is too large/small, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
Returns:
int representing of the given long.

Parameters:
ipAddress - The IP address to connect to
port - The port number to use
timeout - The time to wait before timing out, in seconds
Throws:
IOException - Reports a failure to connect or resolve the given address.

getAdminObject

public static org.openspaces.admin.Admin getAdminObject(String managementIP,
                                                        int expectedGsmCount)
                                                 throws TimeoutException,
                                                        InterruptedException
Gets a "full" admin object. The function waits until all GridServiceManagers are found before returning the object.

Parameters:
managementIP - The IP of the management machine to connect to (through the default LUS port)
expectedGsmCount - The number of GridServiceManager objects that are expected to be found. Only when this number is reached, the admin object is considered loaded and can be returned
Returns:
An updated admin object
Throws:
TimeoutException - Indicates the timeout (default is 90 seconds) was reached before the admin object was fully loaded
InterruptedException - Indicated the thread was interrupted while waiting

executeSSHCommand

public static void executeSSHCommand(String host,
                                     String command,
                                     String username,
                                     String password,
                                     String keyFile,
                                     long timeout,
                                     TimeUnit unit)
                              throws org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException,
                                     TimeoutException
Executes a SSH command.

Parameters:
host - The host to run the command on
command - The command to execute
username - The name of the user executing the command
password - The password for the executing user, if used
keyFile - The key file, if used
timeout - The number of time-units to wait before throwing a TimeoutException
unit - The units (e.g. seconds)
Throws:
org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException - Indicates the command execution failed
TimeoutException - Indicates the timeout was reached before the command completed

deleteFileSystemObject

public static void deleteFileSystemObject(String host,
                                          String username,
                                          String password,
                                          String fileSystemObject,
                                          String keyFile,
                                          long timeout,
                                          TimeUnit unit)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          TimeoutException
Deletes file or folder on a remote host.

Parameters:
host - The host to connect to
username - The name of the user that deletes the file/folder
password - The password of the above user
fileSystemObject - The file or folder to delete
keyFile - The key file, if used
timeout - The number of time-units (i.e. seconds, minutes) before a timeout exception is thrown
unit - The time unit to use (e.g. seconds)
Throws:
IOException - Indicates the deletion failed
TimeoutException - Indicates the action was not completed before the timout was reached
